PublicKeyCredential.summary: The PublicKeyCredential interface provides information about a public key / private key pair, which is a credential for logging in to a service using an un-phishable and data-breach resistant asymmetric key pair instead of a password. It inherits from , and is part of the Web Authentication API extension to the Credential Management API.

blockquote.para: Note: This API is restricted to top-level contexts. Use from within an iframe element will not have any effect.
